mapper.select: select * from tb_news order by tb_news_pageview desc,tb_news_date desc
select * from tb_news where tb_news_type=#{type} order by tb_news_pageview desc,tb_news_date desc
select n.* from tb_user u,tb_user_news_collect c,tb_news n where u.tb_user_id=c.tb_user_id and c.tb_news_id=n.tb_news_id and u.tb_user_id =#{userId} order by c.date desc,n.tb_news_pageview desc
mapper.update: update tb_news set tb_news_pageview=tb_news_pageview+1 where tb_news_id=#{newsId}
update tb_news set tb_news_thumbup=tb_news_thumbup+1 where tb_news_id=#{newsId}
update tb_news set tb_news_collect=tb_news_collect+1 where tb_news_id=#{newsId}
update tb_news set tb_news_collect=tb_news_collect-1 where tb_news_id=#{newsId}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_user_news_collect where tb_user_id=#{userId} and tb_news_id=#{newsId}
